text: Reverse-Flash is a name used by many fictional supervillains appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. They are all enemies of the Flash. A known version of the character is Edward Clariss (also known as the Rival and Rival Flash) first appeared in Flash Comics #104 (February 1949), and was created by John Broome and Joe Kubert. Another well-known version is Eobard Thawne. The character's design is the complete opposite of the Flash with a yellow suit and red flash design. ==References== Category:DC Comics characters
title: Reverse-Flash
